alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 2:10PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Dodge, northwestern Telfair and east central Wilcox Counties through 245 PM EST... At 209 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was near Rhine, or 9 miles east of Abbeville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McRae, Abbeville, Helena, Milan, Rhine, Chauncey, Jay Bird Springs, Temperance, Achord and Workmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
